main.name: Amri Radhwen
main.description: Hello, i am a full stack web developer specialized in MERN stack. I am also interested in other programming languages including Python, java, Php. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I'm a full stack web developer with 5 years experience in React and Nodejs development. I'm also interested in other JavaScript frameworks like Angular, Vue, Ember. I'm looking for a project to work on. I love creating user interfaces for web applications. I enjoy coding because I get to solve problems using my skills, and I get to work with people who are passionate about the same things as me.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers
